mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue-green and gold on white) announcing the Mars Hill Church's Easter Celebration featuring gospel preaching and baptisms with Pastor Mark Driscoll and music by Dustin Kensrue and Mindy Smith on April 24. Poster features a woodcut of a crowd.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
